nodes.text: Armennion Ullgusta was a filmmaker responsible for the holovid documentaries The Edict of Jiaan and Obeisance: Betrayal Within. Both holovids chronicled the extermination of the Jedi Knights at the hands of the Galactic Empire, leading Ullgusta to be labelled as an "enemy of the Empire" and his work to be banned. During the Galactic Civil War, it was rumored that Ullgusta was a frequent guest at Pret Swain's complex in Cjaalysce'I on the planet Socorro.

Armennion Ullgusta was first mentioned in the 1997 West End Games sourcebook, The Black Sands of Socorro. Ullgusta was later mentioned in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
